an4.6:1.7: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno?
an4.6:1.8: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa appakam sutam hoti—
an4.6:1.9: suttam geyyam veyyakaranam gatha udanam itivuttakam jatakam abbhutadhammam vedallam.
an4.6:1.10: So tassa appakassa sutassa na atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti.
an4.6:1.11: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno.
an4.6:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno?
an4.6:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa appakam sutam hoti—
an4.6:2.3: suttam geyyam veyyakaranam gatha udanam itivuttakam jatakam abbhutadhammam vedallam.
an4.6:2.4: So tassa appakassa sutassa atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti.
an4.6:2.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno.
an4.6:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena anupapanno?
an4.6:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa bahukam sutam hoti—
an4.6:3.3: suttam geyyam veyyakaranam gatha udanam itivuttakam jatakam abbhutadhammam vedallam.
an4.6:3.4: So tassa bahukassa sutassa na atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti.
an4.6:3.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena anupapanno.
an4.6:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno?
an4.6:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa bahukam sutam hoti—
an4.6:4.3: suttam geyyam veyyakaranam gatha udanam itivuttakam jatakam abbhutadhammam vedallam.
an4.6:4.4: So tassa bahukassa sutassa atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti.
an4.6:4.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno.
an4.6:4.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasminti.
